title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 March 2017 - XWiki
content:
<OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
00:33 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
00:42 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki

09:27 <msmeria> has quit  
09:27 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:33 <xXHellblazerXx> has left #xwiki  
09:43 <pulkit4tech> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:10 <vmassol> good morning  
10:10 <vmassol> this morning I'm finishing http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-14055  
10:10 <vmassol> and then I'll release the postgresql variant for our xwiki docker image  
10:17 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
10:26 <woshilapin> has quit  
10:26 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:43 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:17 <vmassol> seems playground is still working this morning, cool  
11:19 <vmassol> cool seems the active installs are maintaining FTM: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ActiveInstalls/ ;)  
11:19 <vmassol> (I'm referring to the recent surge)  
11:24 <evalica> vmassol: did you report the UIX syncronization issues on playground for the nodes? if not I will report it  
11:24 <vmassol> you're seeing it again?  
11:25 <vmassol> I didn't report it because I wasn't able to describe the steps to reproduce it  
11:25 <vmassol> but if it reproduces then we  need  to do somrthing about it indeed  
11:26 <vmassol> it seems ok right now for me  
11:26 <vmassol> I see the same thing on both nodes for playground  
11:26 <evalica> I will report it - I have 2 bugs for playground - brb  
12:45 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
12:55 <biswesh> has joined #xwiki  
12:57 <biswesh> has quit  
13:39 <prakhar123> has joined #xwiki  
13:51 <vmassol> ok docker postgres image  for xwiki done and PRs sent for the official images. Now waiting for them to apply it  
13:51 <vmassol> usually takes 1-2 days  
14:02 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
14:11 <vmassol> now we need to remember to update the docker build and official image file whenever we release a new xwiki version...  
14:11 <vmassol> it should be automatable though with a bit of work  
14:11 <vmassol> just to automatically compute the sha256 of the xwiki war + commit the change in our contrib repo + create programmatically a PR for the official image repo  
14:13 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
14:15 <vmassol> I"ve created http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XDOCKER-18 for this  
14:49 <systemd> has quit  
14:50 <systemd> has joined #xwiki  
14:55 <vmassol> Note: this afternoon I'm continuing to improve the xwiki docker image  
15:28 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
15:39 <acotiuga> has quit  
15:40 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
16:15 <prakhar123> has quit  
16:22 <msmeria> has quit  
17:29 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:34 <stargazer> has joined #xwiki  
17:36 <stargazer> Hey folks! I would like to work on Glossary Application idea: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/GlossaryApplication2017 For my GSoC. Is there any mentor around for this project idea?  
17:38 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
17:42 <tmortagne1> that would be vmassol  
18:10 <mflorea> has quit  
18:16 <stargazer> @vmassol you there?  
18:17 <vmassol> otp  
18:17 <evalica> has quit  
18:19 <stargazer> okay  
18:36 <prakhar123> has joined #xwiki  
18:41 <vmassol> stargazer: I'm back  
18:41 <stargazer> great  
18:42 <stargazer> I wanted to know about the glossary idea. I have read the information given and wanted to know what I should include in my proposal  
18:56 <stargazer> logging off..  
18:56 <stargazer> has quit  
18:59 <vmassol> sorry, got caught up by another call  
18:59 <vmassol> stargazer: you still there?  
18:59 <vmassol> so the idea is what is at http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/GlossaryApplication2017  
19:00 <vmassol> you can shape it the way you want in your proposal  
19:00 <vmassol> (add stuff, tune other things, etc)  
19:00 <vmassol> you shouldn't be constrained by what is written and you have liberty to make changes/suggestions  
19:01 <vmassol> I've just put some quick ideas of what I think a glossary app should do but the more the merrier !

21:42 <free4murad[m]> Can anyone please suggest how I should start.
